title: SFEC Form 3620 - Donors of Behested Payments Report - Filings
description:
On January 1, 2019, new local laws went into effect that established new requirements for behested payment reports. If behested payments are made at a City officer’s behest, the donors and recipients of such payments may be required to file public disclosures regarding the payments.

A donor must file Form SFEC-3620 if he or she makes a behested payment, or series of behested payments in a single calendar year of $10,000 or more at the behest of an officer. The donor only needs to make this disclosure if the donor is an “interested party” in a proceeding involving the officer that solicited the payment(s).

If a donor has previously filed a Form SFEC-3.620 and during the same calendar year, subsequently makes an additional behested payment at the behest of the same officer, the donor must file an additional For SFEC-3.620 only if the donor has become involved in additional proceedings or made additional contacts that were not disclosed pursuant to section 3.620(a)(1)-(3) on the initial Form SFEC-3.620.

Each row on this table represents the contents of a Form 3620 filed with the Ethics Commission. There is one sub-tables of information on Form 3620, "Payee Information", that is parsed into a separate dataset "SFEC Form 3620 - Donors of Behested Payments Report - Payees" at https://data.sfgov.org/City-Management-and-Ethics/SFEC-Form-3620-Donors-of-Behested-Payments-Report-/kjzi-iji7. Join this dataset with the sub-table using the DocuSignID.

columns.name: DocuSign ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the filing, generated automatically by DocuSign

columns.name: Filing Type
columns.description: Is the Filing Original, Amendment, or Supplemental? An Amendment supersedes the Original filing; a Supplemental is a continuation of a filing, indicating more fields were required.

columns.name: Original Filing Date
columns.description: Only used if the Filing Type is Amendment, indicating the date of the Original Filing

columns.name: Date Signed
columns.description: Date form was signed and submitted to the Ethics Commission

columns.name: Filing
columns.description: URL to download PDF copy of the filing

columns.name: Amendment Description
columns.description: Explanation for Amendment, provided by filer

columns.name: Additional Payee Checkbox
columns.description: Checkbox indicating if additional pages are required to list all payees. If checked, there should be an additional filing of type "Supplemental".

columns.name: Proceedings To Report Checkbox
columns.description: Checkbox indicating the filer reported proceedings on the filing

columns.name: Additional Proceedings Checkbox
columns.description: Checkbox indicating if additional pages are required to list all proceedings. If checked, there should be an additional filing of type "Supplemental".

columns.name: Contacts To Report Checkbox
columns.description: Checkbox indicating the filer reported contacts on the filing

columns.name: Additional Contacts Checkbox
columns.description: Checkbox indicating if additional pages are required to list all contacts. If checked, there should be an additional filing of type "Supplemental".

columns.name: Donor Name
columns.description: Donor is the filer of this form and payor of contributions

columns.name: Donor Street
columns.description: Donor’s street address

columns.name: Donor City
columns.description: Donor’s city

columns.name: Donor State
columns.description: Donor’s state

columns.name: Donor Zip
columns.description: Donor’s zip code

columns.name: Representative Name
columns.description: Name of authorized representative for donor

columns.name: Representative Telephone
columns.description: Phone number authorized representative for donor

columns.name: Representative Email
columns.description: Email of authorized representative for donor

columns.name: Officer Title
columns.description: Title of City elected officer who behested payment

columns.name: Payees SubTable Query
columns.description: URL to query subtable of itemized payees

columns.name: Officer Name
columns.description: Name of City elected officer who behested payment
